messages: f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (10:45): MarcoZ: pong

3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:46): surkov: Can you take a quick look at the twitter.com web site? When you're logged in, in the top navigation, there is a popup that's not accessible, but according to TheUnfocused, is made up only of divs etc., with position fixed and z-index 6000.
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:46): It has options like "Logout", "Direct messages" etc. in there.
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:47): surkov: And I wonder why we don't render it.
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (10:47): MarcoZ: so you can't open it?
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (10:47): morning everyone!
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (10:47): askalski: hello
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (10:49): MarcoZ: say me steps to reproduce please
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:49): surkov, no I can't.
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:49): surkov: I don't even see that there's a popupable element there.
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:49): surkov: Just go to twitter.com and log in.

3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:52): surkov: In nVDA's virtual bufer, I see "Home", "Connect", and "Discover", but no fourth item. I see a cryptic link starting with f21, but that's not the "Account" or whatever it's called link.
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (10:53): MarcoZ: ok, I'll check it
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (10:53): there is supposed a link after search entry
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (10:54): that should open that popup

3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:54): surkov: Thanks! Sorry I can't be more specific, but without actually seeing the screen, it's difficult. I see a list of 3 items that contains the above links, and then this other confusing stuff, but nothing that would allow me to open the accounts popup where I can sign out, get to my direct messages etc. I only know from sighted people that it's there somewhere.
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (10:56): I'll take a look
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (10:58): I wonder how did you know about this popup

3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:58): surkov: Oh yeahDon't see it. I see the search field, and I see a link witha graphic "Marco Zehe", but when I click that, I get a full page with my profile, recent images, but no option for my DMs, logout etc.
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:58): surkov: From my girlfriend.
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (10:59): surkov: I wanted to log out of Twitter and couldn't find the option. She had to use the mouse to open that popupp and click "Sign out".
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (11:01): Oh wait, I think I found it. It's called "u21CA" in NVDA.
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (11:01): MarcoZ: I was able to log out with screen reader
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (11:01): surkov: Where did that text come from? Do you know?
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (11:01): yeah, I just discovered the same :)
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (11:02): let me look
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (11:03): MarcoZ: it contains that text
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (11:03): beautiful accessibility :)
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (11:04): wanna write accessible site ask twitter :)
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (11:04): surkov: That's really crazy! :)
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (11:04): Do you visually see that text on the screen, too?
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (11:05): I see nice image and arrow down that says me there's a popup
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (11:06): surkov: WTF? Wonder how they managed to mess up *that* markup. O_O
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (11:06): I bet it's automatically generated
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (11:06): because it's crazy
f5137d105ccd11d3c4384e8e8573b3c8 (11:07): human can't write this
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (11:10): surkov: Agreed.
3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (11:13): surkov: Thanks for looking!
47e87577fff6e08b0f2f43540db8c9c9 (11:35): <email/> granted review for attachment 599506 on bug 650241.

47e87577fff6e08b0f2f43540db8c9c9 (11:35): Bug https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=650241 nor, --, ---, surkov.alexander, NEW, Location returned by accessibles sometimes incorrect when page zoomed
